title: DevOps Engineer
zahteve:
1. What do we expect?
- Have at least 2 years of experience with developing/managing infrastructure using modern development processes.
- Have experience with one of OOP languages such as, PHP, Python, Golang, etc.
- Have understanding and experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL) or No-SQL databases (e.g., Mongo).
- Experience with debugging and profiling in a production environment.
- Willingness to learn, and help us learn too.
- Be fluent in written and spoken English.

2. We appreciate:
- A big plus is some interest in or have experience with cloud computing (AWS, Google Azure …).
- Experience with Kubernetes and containerization in production environments.
- B.Sc. or higher in Computer Science or a related field.
- Be open to collaborating in the tech community.
kontakt: Apply here: https://celtra.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0uasp/
opisDelovnegaMesta: We are looking for an infrastructure engineer (DevOps / SRE) to help us manage, grow and scale our infrastructure for both (CA and CE) products. We are looking for a motivated, constantly-learning engineer who understands how modern cloud native infrastructure works.  1. What would be your responsibilities?  You will be part of our DevOps team, which is responsible for our product’s availability, latency, performance, efficiency, monitoring, emergency response and capacity planning. Your responsibility will be:  - Design, develop and maintain software that handles deploying, scaling and monitoring of our products. Establish design patterns and best practices for building new product features in a scalable and reliable way. - Verify and help developers apply those patterns and participate in early stages of feature design, when needed. - On-call a portion of your time to get your hands dirty and gain experience. - Production environment is something you care about and willing to share with developers to diagnose issues and hunt down elusive bugs. - SLA is your law, uptime objectives are met by participating in controlling the risks and rate of change in collaboration with the QA team.  2. What are the challenges ahead?  We are facing many tech challenges ahead. Our application is a giant beast which is deployed multiple times per week. We are working towards having multiple deploys per day, basically for every code change landing in the master branch.  Besides that we want our developers to be productive and spend more time on features and less on hitting infrastructure caused roadblock. Currently, our DevOps team is responsible for our software that is up and running under provided SLA constraints. As software complexity grows, handling incidents becomes harder because of lack of domain knowledge. We are working towards delegating ownership to individual dev teams who will become responsible and capable of handling incident and customer facing issues in production at any time.  3. What kind of infrastructure stack do we have?  We are full on Kubernetes (k8s) and are running our infrastructure in AWS cloud. Our application is containerized in Docker and deployed on k8s cluster. Our application mainly consist of:  - Hundreds of services scaled automatically, - tens of real-time services handling hundreds of millions requests every minute, - tens of different databases, like MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, PostgresDB, …, - monitoring services, like Prometheus, Grafana, ... - our infrastructure is mostly templatized using Terraform and AWS CloudFormation. Some parts of infrastructure and custom scripts are also written in Python.

title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer
zahteve:
3+ years of software engineering experience.
Machine Learning and Data Science knowledge and experience are a big plus, desire to build on it is a must.
Good knowledge of modern backend development, databases, basic data structures and most common design patterns.
Ability to write clean, maintainable, well-tested production code.
A strong desire to learn and grow as a member of a talented engineering and data science team.
You lean towards simple and effective solutions and are allergic to over-engineering.
We expect you to like working with people - you'll be doing that a lot.
You are a reliable, trustworthy person that keeps their promises and takes responsibility for their actions.
Having experience with our stack is a plus, but not mandatory - we value talent, strong fundamentals and dedication to excellence more than the tools you've used.
kontakt: jobs@zemanta.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: We're looking for a versatile machine learning engineer / data scientist to help us grow our real-time bidding (RTB) ad management services across Outbrain and Zemanta infrastructure.  Here's what we're working with: over 250 million machine learning predictions calculated - every second ML models you ship to production have an immediate effect on the business we don't keep cutting-edge ML and deep learning algorithms in the drawer - we deploy them to production terabytes of data generated daily, stored on S3 and BigQuery multi-cloud environment - AWS, GCS, private cloud Go-lang is our main production language, python for offline research production ML algos developed in-house in either Go-lang or TensorFlow in-house distributed AutoML framework for effective offline research powerful research cluster for your use full ownership of the ML-powered features we develop - from idea to final product a lot of learning - both internally (knowledge sharing initiatives) and externally (going to the best conferences, reading papers, watching talks) sharing knowledge externally (talk at conferences and meet-ups, mentor students at DataScience@UL-FRI, Zemanta Data Science Summer School, ...) be a part of a world-class data science and software engineering organization  Does that sound interesting to you? Read on! As a machine learning engineer / data scientist you will be taking our data science opportunities all the way from ideas to solutions - from identifying and formulating the problem with our product managers and colleagues, through exploring terabytes of data, building predictive models and running thousands of offline experiments using our in-house AutoML framework. Then choosing best models and deploying them to production in A/B tests, analysing the results and looking after your models in the wild by monitoring their behaviour.

title: Big Data DevOps Engineer
zahteve:
- Experience with Hadoop eco system
- Knowledge with other large scale distributed system - big advantage
- Experience in one or more scripting languages such as bash/ruby/python
- In-depth knowledge of Linux administration
- Curiosity and a desire to continue learning new processes and technologies in order to become a professional in those systems.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
kontakt: zemanta@jobs.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: Zemanta, an Outbrain company is looking for a NoSQL infrastructure senior engineer to join Outbrain's data store team.  Outbrain is the world's leading content discovery platform, serving Over 300B personalised recommendations monthly, reaching over 800M users from across the globe.  To support this scale, we manage a fleet of over 7000 physical servers, spread across several data centers. Scalability, reliability and "building the right thing" are in our genes, and we wholeheartedly embrace automation and open-source.  In this role, you will deal with building and operating a variety of distributed systems mainly Hadoop, Cassandra, Elasticsearch, Memcached, Druid, Vertica and more. You will be facing great challenges around scale, cross DC support, visibility, automation, and deployment of services in a microservice as well as multi-tenant environments in physical and cloud environments, and will be using a variety of tools like Chef, Prometheus, Grafana and more to do that. You will also be dealing with solving complex system issues and constantly improving the performance of the service. An ideal candidate is a Big Data expert with experience in Linux administration.  Responsibilities: - Overall production data system health (including hundreds of servers). - Provide architectural solutions for complex data issues, involving large-scale solutions and rapid growth. - Building and maintaining high-performance, fault-tolerant, scalable distributed software systems. - Continuance improvement of Operation processes and procedures.

- Izkušnje | Vsaj eno leto izkušenj pri programiranju spletnih storitev v Java programskem jeziku na relacijskih in/ali dokumentnih podatkovnih bazah.
- Znanja | Java, REST/HTTP protokol, podatkovne baze
- Komunikacija | Sposobnost sodelovanja z ekipo okoli sebe (beri: 'team player') in tekoča pisna in govorna angleščina.

Plusi so tudi:

- Front-end | Kakršnekoli izkušnje na 'front-end' delu z javascript ogrodji (React, Vue) ali občutek/zanimanje za UI/UX-a oblikovanje

zahteve:
You responsibilities will include:
- Building and operating backend systems in complex environments.
- Ensuring quality and reliability through unit, integration and end-to-end tests.
- Exposure to DevOps, on-call, incident management and CI/CD pipelines.
- Debugging and troubleshooting issues using instrumentation and logs.
- Demonstrating ownership and initiative with experience driving team projects from conceptualization to successfully delivering business value.
- A genuine desire to help the team work better together with a healthy dose of fun.

- 1+ years experience in Go coding including: 
    a. Knowledge of Go programming language, paradigms, constructs, and idioms,
    b. Knowledge of common Goroutine and channel patterns,
    c. Experience with the full site of Go frameworks and tools.
- 1+ years experience in designing, developing, configuring and supporting containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes.
- Strong analytical, conceptual and problem-solving abilities.
- Ability to manage multiple priorities, and assess and adjust quickly to changing priorities.
- A sense of empathy for users, teammates, colleagues and partners.
- Experience with GraphQL would be an additional advantage.

title: 13|37 .NET Backend Inženir_ka (Intermediate)
zahteve:
Osebe, ki so uspešne v tej vlogi imajo ponavadi:
- Vsaj 2 leti ali več relevantnih izkušenj
- Odlične pisne in govorne komunikacijske sposobnosti v angleščini
- Veselje pri delu s tehnologijami, deljenju znanja in opolnomočenju drugih
- Zaveza k varnosti in izvrstni kvaliteti, ki rezultira v varnih in zanesljivih programskih rešitvah
- Izvrstno poznavanje .NET (#C) ali .NET Core
- Izkušnje z VIsual Studio ali Rider
- Dobro poznavanje objektnega ali pa še bolje funckijskega programiranja
- Izkušnje z event-driven arhitekturo
- izkušnje in razumevanje relacijskih NoSQL bazami podatkov
- $ git commit
- Poznavanje različnih orodij za avtomatizacijo, gradnjo in performance
- Izkušnje s kontejnerizacijo in izvrstne razvojne prakse

Posebno navdušeni bomo še nad:
- Zaveza k vračanju skupnosti razvidna iz odprtokodnih doprinosov oziroma drugih vidnih iniciativ
- Izkušnje z REST in GraphQL APIji
- Izkušnje pri načrtovanju in implementaciji robustnih strategij za avtentikacijo in avtorizacijo uporabnikov
- Izkušnje pri implementaciji visoko performančnih, globalnih in high-traffic storitev
kontakt: Prijaviš se lahko na povezavi https://1337co.de/slotech_net
opisDelovnegaMesta: V mednarodnem tehnološkem podjetju tretton37 -> 13|37 iščemo nadarjene in motivirane sodelavke ter sodelavce, da se pridružijo naši skrbno izbrani ekipi v središču Ljubljane.  Odprtih imamo nekaj priložnosti za top-performing osebe iz različnih tehničnih področij pri razvoju programske opreme po meri. V tem trenutku iščemo predvsem izkušenejše sodelavce, smo pa za pravo osebo z dobrim mindsetom pripravljeni narediti tudi izjemo. Ponujamo okolje z izjemnimi posamezniki in posameznicami v cross-functional timih, ki se soočajo z raznolikimi tehnološkimi problemi v večjih mednarodnih podjetjih in zrelih startupih, ki so izzivalni v vseh osebnostnih in tehničnih pogledih. Bolj kot leta izkušenj so nam sicer pomembni odprtost, radovednost, izjemen odnos in motivacija spreminjati naše okolje in življenja naročnikov, uporabnikov naših aplikacij in programske opreme ter sodelavcev na bolje.   Delal_a boš v agilnem okolju, pri razvoju visoko performančnih, večplastnih in globalno dostopnih aplikacij. Tvoje razvojno delo bo neposredno opolnomočilo organizacije z internimi orodji in pomagalo njihovim produktom odgovoriti na uporabniške potrebe:  - Ideiral_a in razvijal_a boš rešitve za raznolike tehnične probleme v raznovrstnih timih - Aktivno boš sodeloval_a pri sistemski arhitekturi in produktnih odločitvah - Gradil_a boš mikroservise z uporabo serverless in oblačnih tehnologij - Načrtoval_a in implementiral_a boš moderne in visoko dostopne kontejnerizirane backend aplikacije - Proaktivno boš pomagal_a svojim sodelavcem pri njihovem delu, in jim pomagala rasti s pomočjo metod kot so: code reviews, pair programming in druge extreme programming prakse - Nenehno boš iskal_a priložnosti za izboljšanje v odnosu do ljudi, procesov in orodij - Sodeloval_a boš v diskusijah, pri organizaciji delavnic, in aktivno skrbel_a za deljenje svojega znanja - Delal_a boš v distribuiranem timu s sodelavci iz pisarne in remote

.NET

title: Technical Support Manager
zahteve:
Technical knowledge required: 

- Experience using and analyzing data from SaaS software tools commonly used in the marketing, sales and support functions (i.e. Zendesk, HelpScout, Intercom, HubSpot, Salesforce, Shopify, Google Analytics, Pay-per-click ads platforms, etc.)
- Experience querying data from SQL databases and manipulating data via APIs using middleware tools like Zapier and Integromat or directly by writing code.
- Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel power user.  
- Experience working with developers and collaborating with them on issue resolution and feature development.


Managerial experience: 

- Experience in a fast-paced customer or technical support role working directly with customers.
- You must possess strong coaching skills, be able to provide clear and actionable feedback, and properly evaluate individuals’ skill and knowledge level to put them in roles where they can succeed.
- You must possess strong communication skills, be able to clearly communicate short-term plans, guide the team through process changes, gather team’s feedback and ideas to incorporate into future plans and effectively manage change. 
- A proven track record of effectively collaborating and problem-solving with peers in other functional areas of a business. 


Specifically, your responsibilities will include: 

- Becoming an expert at the Databox software (including our integrations) and working with your team and our engineering teams to investigate and resolve technical support tickets correctly and quickly. 
- Managing individuals and team performance by monitoring productivity and analyzing data to identify opportunities for improvement and necessary changes to achieve team’s objectives.
- Develop processes, systems, training, as well as draft detailed quarterly plans and the steps needed to execute those plans.
Recruit, hire, train, coach and develop a world-class global team.

You must be comfortable working in a team-environment, be willing to accept, apply and deliver coaching, be accountable for agreed-upon outcomes, and thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic, and collaborative environment.
kontakt: jobs@databox.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: Databox, a fast-growing, profitable Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company that helps other companies monitor, report and improve their performance, is seeking to hire a Technical Support Manager to join our Support team.  Handling over 2,000 support chats and 600+ technically advanced cases from Databox customers every month, our technical support team plays a key role in assisting customers with product evaluation, setup and ticket resolution. They are the critical link between our customers, engineering teams and our other customer-facing teams: Sales, Onboarding and Account Management.  As our business and team grows, we’re looking to add someone with both technical and managerial experience who can manage and lead this growing team.

title: Product Manager
zahteve:
As a Product Manager you will:

Contribute to the product vision, strategy and road map for the product
Prepare product requirements and specifications documents
Gather, manage, and prioritize requirements from different stakeholders
Bring customer to the table by articulating customer needs and pains
Putting yourself in the skin of a customer and never stop thinking about how to make the product ever better and easier to use
Coordinate assistance from other teams (design, engineering, sales, marketing)
Communicate closely with all team members and stakeholders
Develop the business case for new products and improvements to existing products
Identify the market opportunities

REQUIREMENTS

The ideal candidate will excel at the following:

Understanding product development lifecycle
Ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority
Understanding both business strategy and execution
Knowing to define success, for the customer and the product, by prioritizing doing what is right over doing what is easy
Working effectively with engineers, participating in things like bug prioritization and scoping meetings
Problem-solving skills and dealing with uncertainty and unknown situations
Demonstrated ability to think strategically and act tactically
Confidence presenting and regularly reporting on initiatives across all levels of the organization


Additional skills needed:

Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial, start-up environment
Positive "no excuses" attitude
Strong written and verbal communication
Good interpersonal skills
Analytics and troubleshooting skills
Time management skills
Business skills
kontakt: jobs@databox.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: Databox, a fast-growing software company that helps other companies monitor and improve their business performance, is looking for a Project Manager to help us manage projects across different product and engineering teams.   Databox is disrupting the $16B Business Analytics and Intelligence by providing a free-to-start, easy-to-setup option for small and medium-sized businesses who want to track performance metrics from popular business software tools in one application on any device. Join us and help us deliver business intelligence to the millions of companies who are desperate for a way to predictably improve their company’s performance using data.   We are looking for a Product Manager to join our Product team. This is a highly collaborative role that requires passion for products, effective & consistent communication with all team members, and personal integrity for building mutual trust and respect.

opisDelovnegaMesta: Databox, a software company that helps other companies monitor, report and improve their business performance, is looking for a Senior QA Engineer to join our product team in Ptuj, Slovenia, to help us scale our systems from thousands to millions of users.  The ideal candidate has experience with software testing, building and maintaining automated tests, writing test cases and basic coding experience. Someone who knows how to help engineers build faster and ship more reliable software.  Our product team includes experts in UI/UX design, front-end, mobile and backend engineering. We launch applications and features from scratch using the latest technologies and agile software development principles. We're still a pretty small team and are looking for an engineer who feels good wearing many hats. A self-starter who is willing to jump headfirst into the codebase and begin making improvements immediately would be the ideal candidate for this role.   About our Engineering Team:  Our backend infrastructure is split into several major components including data calculations (crunching user data), data rendering, application business logic and other traditional MVC components. The majority of our applications and services are built using PHP and NodeJS. PostgreSQL is used for our main database and our data warehouse. Our warehouse is growing rapidly and loading, transforming and calculating the data is becoming more and more challenging. We believe the help of a highly engaged engineer can give us an extra boost in these areas.  We are always exploring new tools and ideas as our needs evolve, and we love working alongside people who are willing to try new things. Code reviews, writing unit tests, and belief in the value of coding standards are only some of our core engineering values. We recognize achievement, promote from within, and encourage professional growth, collaboration, knowledge sharing and fun.

We're still a pretty small team and are looking for an engineer who feels good wearing many hats. A self-starter who is willing to jump headfirst into the codebase and begin making improvements immediately would be the ideal candidate for this role.  About our Engineering Team:  Our backend infrastructure is split into several major components including data calculations (crunching user data), data rendering, application business logic and other traditional MVC components. The majority of our applications and services are built using PHP and NodeJS. PostgreSQL is used for our main database and our data warehouse. Our warehouse is growing rapidly and loading, transforming and calculating the data is becoming more and more challenging. We believe the help of a highly engaged engineer can give us an extra boost in these areas.  We are always exploring new tools and ideas as our needs evolve, and we love working alongside people who are willing to try new things. Code reviews, writing unit tests, and belief in the value of coding standards are only some of our core engineering values. We recognize achievement, promote from within, and encourage professional growth, collaboration, knowledge sharing and fun.

title: System Administrator Linux/AWS
zahteve:
Hands-on experience in one or more of the following:
- Experience working with public cloud infrastructures like AWS, Azure, or GCP
- Linux administration
- Monitoring tools such as Prometheus, InfluxDB, PagerDuty, Zabbix, etc.
- Cloud provisioning tools like CloudFormation, Terraform, Azure RM, etc.
- Container orchestration with Kubernetes
- Configuration management tools like Puppet, Chef, Ansible, etc.
- Database technologies and database services in AWS (MySQL in particular)
- Servers and proxies such as Nginx, HAProxy, Varnish
- Message broker technologies, RabbitMQ, Kafka
- Scripting and writing automation tools (Bash, Go, Ruby, etc.)

Your profile:
- Have a relevant higher education
- Want to learn more about cloud providers and their services
- Have a Master or Bachelor Degree in computer science or equivalent experience
- Have good written and spoken business English is a must
- Have the willingness to learn new technologies and share technical knowledge
- Are a positive, team player with a can-do attitude
kontakt:
Apply directly via: https://sportradar.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/sportradar_careers/job/Ljubljana/System-Administrator-Linux-AWS_JREQ2131
or send an email to tina.strus@sportradar.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: As a System administrator in Sportradar, you will be part of Sportradar's global team. The team works closely with developers, security, DevOps, and Architects.  Sportradar invests heavily in automation and accessibility services. We are therefore looking for a new team member who can implement and maintain such services. Our server infrastructure consists of thousands of physical and virtual machines, includes managed services, Kubernetes clusters, and spans several physical data centers as well as Amazon Web Services (AWS). We are expanding our virtual infrastructure with container orchestration through Kubernetes and explore managed services with our cloud provider.  You will work with the solutions of the future in the sports, media, and betting industry. You will collaborate with developers on technical architecture and the implementation of new products and services.  THE CHALLENGE: - Collaborate on technical architecture and implementation of new products and services - Search, select and implement new tools and technologies that make life easier - Keep things running by continuous monitoring, alerting, and catching spots to improve  About Sportradar: Sportradar is on a journey! We’ve adopted the Spotify model to empower our people; we value local decision making. Tribes have defined tech stacks and ways of working however with continuous improvement in our DNA we’ve created ‘make it better time’ where you get to shape our future stack and ways of working, as well as work on the problems you care about it or improve your own skills. We are actively adopting test-driven development as it matches our engineering principle ‘if it’s not tested, its broken’. We follow a cloud native strategy; managed services enable us to focus on the problems that interest us most – and we invest in our people with AWS training as we recognize the skills modern developers need to succeed. We’ve a preference for modern lightweight microservices; we leverage the right tools for the job. If this sounds interesting, we should talk.

zahteve:
Želena je visoka izobrazba tehnične smeri (elektrotehnika/elektronika) in najmanj 1 leto delovnih izkušenj na področju razvoja strojne programske opreme. Od tebe pričakujemo dobro razvite komunikacijske in organizacijske veščine, odlično sodelovanje v ekipi in prevzemanje odgovornosti za svoje delo.

- Poznavanje osnov brezžičnih tehnologij BLE in UWB
- Napredno poznavanje programskega jezika C za mikrokrmilnike

kontakt: Če bi se rad/a pridružila Chipolo ekipi, pošlji svoje kontaktne podatke, življenjepis (CV) ter nekaj primerov dosedanjega dela na jobs@chipolo.net z zadevo »Razvijalec strojne programske opreme (tvoje ime)«. Prijave sprejemamo do vključno 15. oktobra 2021.
opisDelovnegaMesta: Si želiš delati v hitrorastočem podjetju z mladim, ambicioznim kolektivom? Te mika soustvarjati produkte blagovne znamke, ki je prepoznavna na svetovnem nivoju? Te zanima razvoj z najnovejšimi tehnologijami na področju brezžičnih komunikacij BLE in UWB? Te zanima delo z novimi tehnologijami s strani podjetji kot sta Apple in Google? Potem je to odlična priložnost zate!  Iščemo kreativnega, ambicioznega razvijalca strojne in strojne programske opreme, ki ima že nekaj znanja, želi pa si več izkušenj in osebnega napredka. Tvoja najpomembnejša odgovornost bo razvoj strojne programske opreme in implementacija najnovejših brezžičnih tehnologij BLE in UWB. V skladu s širšo produktno strategijo boš pripravljal prototipe in skrbel za razvojni cikel ter projektno dokumentacijo. Prav tako pa boš tudi nudil podporo ostalim članom ekipe in s tem spoznal in pridobil izkušnje na vseh področjih razvoja strojne opreme, s čemer se ti bo kasneje odprla tudi možnost za napredovanje. title: Pisec in oblikovalec našega spletnega nastopa
zahteve:
Da obvlada (vsaj) pisno sporočanje v slovenščini in angleščini. Ako ide i hrvatski, još bolje.
Da išče delo, ki ga rad opravlja, ga zanima več in ne išče le "varne" zaposlitve v uradu za zadeve imenovanem "čiči pa čaki".
Da razume pomen socialnih omrežij, neposrednega sporočanja in si upa predstavit podjetje, blagovne znamke ali izdelke pisno ali osebno.
Da obvlada bitno in vektorsko grafiko (vsaj osnovni nivo).
Da obvlada vsaj HTML in osnove CSS. Vse kar je več je prednost, ne iščemo pa programerja.
Prednost bomo dali takemu:
- ki se zna resno zajebavat, če se da brez cinizma in na svoj račun. Ta račun bo tudi Eventusov ;)
- ki razume kripto valute in izdelke za njih varovanje
Da so odgovorni do sebe in drugih, so točni in redoljubni. (npr. kadilcev ne vabimo niti na razgovor).
Smo perfektno pismenost že omenili? Zagotovo se mi je kaj zatipkalo v tem oglasu in to te bom vprašal na razgovoru :)
kontakt:
zaposlitev@eventus.si

Na prijave tipa "kaj se pa kej dela? A lahk kr kuj začnem od doma? Ke pa ste vi to? a lahk pridem sam neki vprašat? kok je pa dopusta?" zaradi pomanjkanja časa, žal ne bomo odgovorili.
Mi smo 100% za dober štos, nismo pa neresni ;)
opisDelovnegaMesta: Želimo si sodelavko ali sodelavca, ki razume računalništvo, zabavno elektoniko, ima veselje do novih tehnologij in je sposoben izdelke, ki jih tržimo, predstavit na tehnično pravilen a tudi humoren način.   Delo obsega: - Vpis izdelkov v spletno trgovino - opis lastnosti, specifikacij, urejanje slikovnega in video materiala. Vse na podlagi vsebine proizvajalca. - Pisanje navodil za te iste izdelke. V resnici gre za smiselno prevajanje EN navodil v krajšo obliko, torej brez klobasanja. - Urejanje, postavitev in izgled spletne strani s pomočjo CMS vmesnika (Shopamine), tudi z uporabo osnovne HTML in CSS kode. - Pisanje oglasnih sporočil (mailingov) ciljanih na (znanega) kupca. - Igranje 4 v vrsto, mlina, ladijce potapljat... Kasneje lahko tudi:  - Oblikovanje reklamnih pasic različnih formatov. Digitalnih in za tisk. - Administracijo marketinških aktivnosti. - Kuhanje kave sebi, sicer pa vsaj sodelavcem ;)

1. Minimum of 5 years of total experience with demonstrated projects 
2. Experience with Spring framework for web applications, more specifically Spring Boot. Ideally 2+ years of experience.
3. Experience with Kotlin as a programming language is highly regarded. If not, extensive Java knowledge (version 8 or later). 
4. Good knowledge of relational databases and experience with PostgreSQL is an advantage. We rely on JPA and JPQL, so experience with them is a bonus.

Should have knowledge:
1. Ability to write clean, composable, testable code
2. Understanding of how HTTP works
3. Distributed application fallacies
4. oRTB protocols 

Good to have knowledge:
1. GraphQL and RESTfull API design
2. Kubernetes essentials

In addition to your coding and technical knowledge we need candidates who can work efficiently in remote teams and are team players.  This is an early stage startup where tasks can change quickly and we move fast.
kontakt:
dilpesh@aequus.mobi
andy@aequus.mobi
opisDelovnegaMesta: We are looking for an experienced back-end engineer to join our development team as we continue to build and scale our platform. We are a distributed team all working remote in Europe.   Our ideal candidate has prior advertising technology (adtech) experience. If you have worked with oRTB protocols and integrations you will go to the top of our list.

opisDelovnegaMesta: Are you interested in joining a company, which helps perform over 7 billion public transport trips per year? Full Stack development role will be focused on development and feature expansion of our Content Management Platform and applications for our Papercast devices for public transport. Content Management System controls multiple IoT devices (Papercasts) and works as a centralized point for content management delivery to end IoT devices, for better passenger experience in public transport.

title: C# Razvijalec Windows namiznih aplikacij
zahteve:
- Strokovno znanje C# (>= 8) z ogrodjem .NET (>= 4.8) / .NET Core (>= 3.1).
- Pretekle projekte iz WPF uporabniških vmesnikov.
- Izkušnje z Microsoft Visual Studio (zaželjen 2019).
- Razumevanje uporabe REST protokola.
- Poznavanje priljubljenih serializacijskih formatov (JSON, YAML, Protocol Buffers, MessagePack, ...).
- Vešč vsaj enega priljubljenega tipa podatkovne baze (SQLite, MySQL, postgreSQL…) skupaj z Entity Framework / Entity Framework Core.
- Mentaliteto MVVM arhitekturnega snovanja.
- Dobro poznavanje Gita (GitLab server in UI ali CLI client).
- Principi in dobre prakse objektno orientiranega programiranja (OOP, SOLID principi, Design patterns).
- Občutek za uporabniško izkušnjo.

Zaželena dodatna znanja:
- Poznavanje popularnih frontend tehnologij (Blazor, JavaScript, HTML+CSS, ...).
- Dobro razumevanje TCP/IP stacka.
- Izkušnje s strojno komunikacijo (FTDI, USB, RS232, ...).
- Poznavanje webservice tehnologij (gRPC).
kontakt: Če vas odlikujejo zanesljivost, ambicioznost, proaktivnost in vztrajnost in vas zanima delo v našem podjetju, nam pošljite svoj življenjepis na jobs@guardiaris.com.
opisDelovnegaMesta: - Razvijanje Windows namizne aplikacije WPF z MVVM arhitekturo. - Komunikacija med spletnimi storitvami z REST ali gRPC. - Branje in pisanje podatkov v podatkovno bazo z uporabo Entity Framework Core. - Komentiranje kode, pisanje dokumentacije, verzioniranje kode (git @ Gitlab), pregled kode (code reviews). - Razvoj internih orodij in aplikacij za končnega uporabnika. - Konstruktivno sodelovanje z grafičnimi oblikovalci.

title: Arhitekt kontrolnih sistemov
zahteve:
- Razumevanje temeljne fizike naprav in objektov, kjer delujemo in namen njihove uporabe.
- Poznavanje aktualnih tehnologij in trendov.
- Dobro razumevanje konceptov programiranja in algoritmov.
- Sposobnost razlaganja kompleksnih tehničnih in znanstvenih tem laičnemu občinstvu.
- Sposobnost prepoznavanja in definiranja ustreznih spretnosti članov tehnične ekipe z namenom reševanja različnih izzivov.
- Sposobnost delegiranja nalog in odgovornosti na sodelavce.
- Posedovanje sledečih mehkih veščin:
* Sposobnost reševanja težav (zmožnost abstraktnega razmišljanja,  prepoznavanja problematičnih konceptov  in iskanje najučinkovitejših rešitev).
* Vedoželjnost (želja razumeti delovanje strojev in kompleksnih sistemov, iskanje novih virov informacij, postavljanje vprašanj).
* Zmožnost hitrega prilagajanja (spremljanje hitro spreminjajočih se tehnologij, konceptov in  programskih jezikov z namenom iskanja pravočasnih in ustreznih rešitev).

Zaželjena tehnična znanja:
- C/C++, Python in/ali LabVIEW.
- mTCA, PXI, PLC (Siemens, Beckhoff).
- Industrijski protokoli (Modbus, Profibus, EtherCAT).
- SCADA sistemi.

Zaželjene vodstvene izkušnje:
- Izkušnje s postavitvijo strukture projektov vključno z razčlenitvijo dela, načrtovanjem začetnih virov, definiranjem tveganj ter izpolnjevanjem zastavljenega plana.
- Izkušnje z upravljanjem odnosov s strankami, definiranjem obsega projekta in usklajevanjem pričakovanj strank.
kontakt:
Vabimo te, da se nam pridružiš. Tvojo prijavo v angleščini oddaj na https://www.cosylab.com/careers/technical-architect/ do 1.10.2021. Prijava naj vključuje:
- življenjepis,
- kratko motivacijsko pismo in 
- morebitna priporočila.
opisDelovnegaMesta: Smo v procesu širitve ekipe in iščemo Arhitekta kontrolnih sistemov katerega ključna vloga bo razumevanje potreb strank ter preoblikovanje le-teh v zahtevke, priprava projektnih planov, oblikovanje arhitekture programske in strojne opreme in vodenje razvojne ekipe.   Arhitekt kontrolnih sistemov ima ključno vlogo v našem razvojnem procesu, saj deluje kot most med stranko in tehnično ekipo. S posvetovanjem s strankami in sodelavci v tehnični ekipi, bo vaš cilj opredelitev vseh potrebnih specifikacij sistema z namenom zagotavljanja popolnoma skladnega kontrolnega sistema. Oblikovanje tovrstnega sistema zahteva na eni strani razumevanje celotnih funkcionalnosti kontrolnega sistema, na drugi strani pa je potrebno razumevanje tehničnih specifikacij in potencialnih omejitev uporabljenih komponent. V celotnem delovnem procesu bo potrebna odprava številnih tehničnih težav in pomanjkljivosti in od vas pričakujemo, da boste pripravili ustrezno arhitekturo, ki bo ponujala celovito rešitev.  Delovne naloge in odgovornosti: - Komunikacija s strankami glede njihovih zahtev in specifikacij. - Opredelitev obsega dela in priprava projektnega načrta (časovni okvir, mejniki, potrebno število sodelavcev na projektu, stroški). - Načrtovanje programske in strojne arhitekture. - Nudenje ustrezne tehnične podpore razvojni ekipi. - Priprava in predstavitev tehničnih rešitev (notranjim in zunanjim sodelavcem).
